name: Expert Sniper
text: Your quick ranged attacks make you difficult to locate.
benefit: You reduce the penalty on your Stealth checks to stay hidden while sniping by 10.
normal: You take a –20 penalty on Stealth checks to stay hidden while sniping.
text_zh: 你深通打一枪换一个地方的真髓。
benefit_zh: 你在发动狙击（Sniping）以后重新隐蔽自己的潜行技能检定减值降低10点。
normal_zh: 你在发动狙击以后重新隐蔽自己的潜行技能检定承受-20减值。
